references.reason: This foundational text provides a comprehensive overview of machine learning, grounding the theoretical framework of the current paper.
This paper introduces the foundational concept of Multiple Instance Learning (MIL), which is central to the research presented.

references.paper_title: Solving the multiple instance problem with axis-parallel rectangles
references.reason: This paper proposes a significant early algorithm for MIL, which provides a baseline for comparison and a point of departure for the current work.
This paper provides a relevant and recent review of neural network approaches to MIL, which serves as a foundation for the paper's investigation of deep MIL.
This work is a significant advancement in deep MIL, directly influencing the current research by demonstrating a successful application of attention mechanisms within deep MIL.
